mapper.select: delete from INSBRenewalquoteitem where taskid = #{taskid} and inscomcode = #{inscomcode}

update INSBRenewalquoteitem set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},itemcode = #{itemcode},itemname = #{itemname},itemvalue = #{itemvalue} where id = #{id}
